archimate:Capability.name: Application Security
archimate:Capability.documentation: Providing functions so only the right people and systems have the right access, according to authentication and authority. This may call for e.g. > User Management through a central user repository > User - Role Management > Authentication with Single Sign-On > Authentication with "Strong Authentication" if needed > Authorization that is Role and Rule based, and Central Authentication based
